channel.title: Marc-scape 614 Join Now Need staff
channel.description:
First all thanks to jet kai we a re runing spawnscape based server
What makes Marc-Scape 614 different from other Servers you may ask?? We may have about 20 players, but we have coded a lot.
Forums link: Webclient link: Vote: Donate: Click Here To Download [Features:]
-- Right Now We Are Giving Temperary Donator, So just come check us out! -- All we ask is for you too just try it, You will fall in love with the constant Updates!
- Fully equipped Pkshop - PkP System - Decent and fun economy. - 24.7 Uptime - Vote4Cash (Coming soon) - Vote4PkPoints (Coming soon) - Trading - Webclient (Cmoning soon) - 100% Private Messaging (even better than RS ) - x2 Cash weekend - Active helpful staff - 3 Levels of Donator status - Great updates! - Completely Lag Free! - 100% working leeches - Perfect Accuracy, Nothing too overpowered, nothing too underpowered. - Working Korasi’s Sword - Multi Barrages - Xp Counter - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - All Spirit shields working, Even their affects. - Working Teleblock - Staff of light Special - Yell with custom tags ( only donators+ ) - Daily Tournament Events
What are the benefits of playing Marc-Scape 614? Most players come here to pk, and that is which we provide excellent and never seen before quality pvp, we provide a wild range of pking areas, we have areas great for hybriding, and we include almost all teleports circling the pking community. As we know a lot of players love to use items that stick out or aren't seen used that much. Thanks to our excellent helpers and our fantastic systems, we have enhanced item coding. Most items you will ever use are coded, we went from the bottom level of a chef hat to high quality Battle Robes and Dungeoneering armour!
Owner Of Our Lovely server is Marc
Co Owner Is Rich
We still need Staff Come join And INvite ur Friends.
http://www.runelocus.com/images/serv...0713_33789.png
http://www.runelocus.com/images/serv...0713_33787.png
http://www.runelocus.com/images/serv...0713_33788.png
http://www.runelocus.com/images/serv...0713_33790.png
Some pics Will add soon
